contentList.content: Your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Rage">Rage</LSTag> has fueled you with <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag>.

Your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Rage">Rage</LSTag> fuels you. At the beginning of each turn while raging, you gain <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag> equal to [1] + your <LSTag Tooltip="Constitution">Constitution</LSTag> <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Modifier</LSTag>.
